item.title: Python 2.0 was discontinued on Kodi Matrix || Learn more at: https://kodi.tv/article/the-sun-sets-on-python-2/

Aeon Nox 5 Discontinued || As of Jan 1, 2023, the Aeon Nox 5 skin for Kodi has been officially discontinued. This popular skin, known for its extensive customization options and user-friendly interface, will no longer receive updates or support. Users are encouraged to explore alternative skins available in the Kodi repository to enhance their media center experience. For further discussions and updates, please visit the Kodi community forums.

For further discussions and updates, please visit the Kodi community forums.

item.title: Elysium Skin Discontinued || As of Jan 1, 2023, the Elysium skin for Kodi has been officially discontinued. This skin was well-loved for its beautiful design and extensive customization options. Users are encouraged to explore alternative skins available in the Kodi repository to enhance their media center experience. For further discussions and updates, please visit the Kodi community forums.

item.title: New Features in Kodi 17 || The latest update to Kodi 17 introduces exciting new features, including a revamped user interface, improved performance, and enhanced support for various media formats. Users can now enjoy a more streamlined and customizable media center experience. For a full list of features and improvements, visit the Kodi official website.

Users can now enjoy a more streamlined and customizable media center experience. For a full list of features and improvements, visit the Kodi official website.

item.title: Python 3 is Here! || Kodi has officially transitioned to Python 3, bringing improved performance and new features for developers. This change enhances the overall experience for users and developers alike. For more information on the transition and what it means for your Kodi experience, visit the Kodi official website.
